description: audio-tagger crawls audio libraries, measures EBU R128 integrated loudness, estimates tempo/BPM and musical key, reads channel layout/bit depth/sample rate, and extracts codecs/containers. Outputs deterministic JSON/NDJSON sidecars and optionally embeds ID3/Vorbis tags with provenance (timestamp, tool version, input hash). Designed for reproducibility and archives.
